messages.content:
Look at pictures and write a poem.
![image](http://qianwen-res.oss-accelerate-overseas.aliyuncs.com/Qwen-VL/blog/Image_Case_1_3.png)

A rocky crag by the sea,
A place of solitude and mystery.
The water calm and blue,
Reflecting the sky above, anew.

The mountain stands tall and proud,
Its peak reaching towards the clouds.
A symbol of strength and resilience,
Enduring through time's relentless persistence.

The world around may change and shift,
But this mountain remains steadfast and uplifted.
A reminder to us all,
To stand firm in our own personal call.

So let us take a moment to pause,
And appreciate this natural cause.
For in its beauty and grandeur,
We find inspiration and renewal, forever.
